purpose: The email is a call for papers for the MLOps25 workshop, which will be held in conjunction with the 28th European Conference on Artificial Intelligence (ECAI 2025) in Bologna, Italy. The workshop aims to address operational challenges in machine learning and promote discussions on MLOps practices. It invites submissions on various topics related to MLOps, including frameworks, lifecycle management, and ethics. Important dates for paper submission and notification of acceptance are provided, along with guidelines for submission and publication details.

infos:
Subject: [Call for Papers] MLOps25 - Workshop on Machine Learning Operations
From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Reply-To:SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Date:Thu, 15 May 2025 21:18:37 -0000
Content-Type:text/plain
Event co-located with the 28th European Conference on Artificial Intelligence (ECAI 2025), October 25-30, 2025, Bologna (Italy)
Accepted papers will be published in the CEUR Workshop Proceedings (CEUR-WS.org).
We look forward to your contributions and to the stimulating discussions on MLOps that will unfold at the workshop!

conf_name_candidates.evidence:
MLOps25
Workshop on Machine Learning Operations
co-located with the 28th European Conference on Artificial Intelligence (ECAI 2025)
